# DropLocationPromotionInformation

**Properties**

| Name      | Type   | Required | Description                                        |
| :-------- | :----- | :------- | :------------------------------------------------- |
| locale    | string | ✅       | Locale (language/ dialect) for the promotion code. |
| promotion | string | ✅       | Promotion text for the given location.             |
